text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org

name: USCoreGoalCodes
title: US Core Goal Codes
description: Concepts from CPT and LOINC code systems that can be used to indicate the goal.
